characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If this model has a twin heavy bolter, it will automatically shoot at the nearest enemy INFANTRY unit in the Shooting phase within range. If this model has a twin lascannon, it will automatically shoot at the nearest enemy non-INFANTRY model in the Shooting phase within range. If there are none of the specified types of unit in range then the closest enemy unit of any kind must be targeted. However, in all cases this model may only target enemy CHARACTER models if they are the closest model.
